arcade.patch.env.location

Class PatchLocationFactoryRect

  • java.lang.Object
    • arcade.patch.env.location.PatchLocationFactory
      • arcade.patch.env.location.PatchLocationFactoryRect
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LocationFactory

    public final class PatchLocationFactoryRect
extends PatchLocationFactory
    Concrete implementation of PatchLocationFactory for rectangular geometry.

    Cell agents exist on a rectangular grid and molecules in the environment diffuse on a smaller rectangular lattice, such that each grid rectangle corresponds to 4 lattice rectangles. The rectangular locations are defined in the (x, y, z) coordinate space such that (0,0,0) is the rectangle in the center of the simulation (for the grid) and the left rectangle of the center slice (for the lattices).
